Poetic Translation: Innsbruck, I have to leave you;
On foreign roads I'll grive you;

Direct Translation: See translation at Choral Public Domain Library.

Lyrics: GroÁE leid muÁE ich yetz tragen

Poetic Translation: And yet I dare not grumble

Lyrics: ach lieb nun laÁE mich Armen
Poetic Translation: O love, your arms around me,

Lyrics: das ich von dann muÁE sein!
Poetic Translation: For I must leave you here.
And in all virtue tend you
Till I come home to you.
